entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
